ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:0.2_0: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:0.4_0: The sub-chapter on the dark of the night
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:0.5_0: 19. The training rule on cursing another
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.2_0: some nuns were unable to find their possessions. They said to the nun Caṇḍakāḷī,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.5_0: “Why are you asking me if I’ve seen your things? Am I a thief? Am I shameless?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.7_0: Venerables, if I took your things I would no longer be an ascetic. I would fall from the spiritual life and be reborn in hell.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.8_0: May anyone who speaks such an untruth about me lose her monastic status, depart from the spiritual life, and be reborn in hell!”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.9_0: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized Thullanandā,
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.10_0: “How can Venerable Caṇḍakāḷī invoke hell and the spiritual life to curse herself and others?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.11_0: “Is it true, monks, that the nun Caṇḍakāḷī did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.14_0: “... How can the nun Caṇḍakāḷī invoke hell and the spiritual life to curse herself and others?
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.15_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.16_0: the Buddha said, “And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule like this:
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:1.17.1_0: ‘If a nun invokes hell or the spiritual life to curse herself or someone else, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.1.4_0: ... The nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.1.9_0: If she invokes hell or the spiritual life as a curse, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.1_0: If the other person is fully ordained, and she perceives them as such, and she invokes hell or the spiritual life to curse them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.2_0: If the other person is fully ordained, but she is unsure of it, and she invokes hell or the spiritual life to curse them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.3_0: If the other person is fully ordained, but she does not perceive them as such, and she invokes hell or the spiritual life to curse them, she commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.4_0: If she invokes the animal realm, the ghost realm, or human misfortune as a curse, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.5_0: If she curses someone who is not fully ordained, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.6_0: If the other person is not fully ordained, but she perceives them as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.7_0: If the other person is not fully ordained, but she is unsure of it, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.2.8_0: If the other person is not fully ordained, but she perceives them as such, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.3.2_0: At the fore of the counsel
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.3.3_0: for the benefit of the teaching
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.3.6_0: if she is the first offender.
ai-pli-tv-bi-vb-pc19:2.3.7_0: The ninth rule, the training rule on nine, is finished.
